thread.title: Rita’s Italian Ice Offering Free Treats On First Day Of Spring
thread.title_full: Rita’s Italian Ice Offering Free Treats On First Day Of Spring

author: CBS Pittsburgh
title: Rita’s Italian Ice Offering Free Treats On First Day Of Spring
text:
Rita’s Italian Ice Offering Free Treats On First Day Of Spring March 18, 2017 6:00 PM (Photo Credit: KDKA) 
PITTSBURGH (KDKA) — Rita’s Italian Ice is welcoming Spring with a sweet giveaway. 
On Monday, Mar. 20, you can snag a free Italian ice between the hours of noon and 9 p.m. 
Last year, Rita’s gave away one million cups of Italian ice during the # RitasFirstDayofSpring giveaway.
